sent.orig: Yours 17th message partly obscure repeat five word proceeding unless.
sent.trans: 你方17日来电部分内容不明确，请重复一下一步UNLESS前面五个字。

sent.orig: Unless, unless Sunnis themselves decided decide to stop them asdid in 2007.
sent.trans: 除非逊尼派自己决定停止自2007年的行为。

sent.orig: Sandals are never appropriate a job interview, unless you are applying fora job a lifeguard.
sent.trans: 除非你应聘的是救生员的工作，否则凉鞋是不合适的。

sent.orig: We decided to engage with the enemy at dawn, unless he bad retreated during the night.
sent.trans: 我们决定黎明前袭击敌人，除非夜里他们撤退。

sent.orig: Lk. 13:5 No, I tell you; but unless you repent, you shall all similarly perish.
sent.trans: 路十三5我告诉你们，不是的。你们若不悔改，都要如此灭亡。
